```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
```

#Turismo Receptor



```{r}
files <- list.files("../../raw_data/raw_data3", pattern = "^raw_INE_t_receptor_por_mun_destino_.*$", full.names = TRUE)


df_all = data.frame(
  mes = integer(),
  pais_oring_cod = character(),
  pais_orig	= character(),
  mun_dest_cod	= character(),
  mun_dest	= character(),
  turistas	= integer(),
  prov_dest_cod	= character(),
  prov_dest= character()

)
for(file in files){
  
  sheets <- excel_sheets(file)
  
  for(sheet in sheets){
  df_new <- read_excel(file, sheet = sheet)
  df_all <- rbind(df_all,df_new)
  }
}

df_all
```

```{r}
write_csv(df_all,"../../tidy_data/data3/tidy_turismo_receptor_por_mun_dest.csv")
```
